name: Spherical Conquest
description:
Spherical Conquest is a small scall RTS game. Players start the game on a randomly generated world and must defeat the oncoming enemy! Resource Management quickly becomes important as the enemies start coming faster and faster!

NOTE: Controls are up to date for the most recent build. Prior builds may not have all controls implemented!

Basic Controls:

(Left Click) or (Left Click and Drag) to select units.

(Right Click) to command units to move to a position.

(Mouse Scrollwheel) to zoom in and out.

(WASD) to rotate the view around the world.

Building Controls:

If you have enough resources, you can place buildings of various types. First click the building you want to build, then click in the world to place it.

Recruitment Controls:

To recruit a unit, simply click the unit you want to build. If you have enough resources, the unit will be created at your base.

Hot Key Controls:

Press (F) to select all units.

Press (CTRL) + (0-9 [not on numpad]) to hotkey selected units to that key.

Press (0-9 [not on numpad]) to select hotkeyed units.
